data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Nigde, Turkey.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Nigde, Turkey
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Nigde, Turkey the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Jesus, 343,700 people live in the state of Nigde. Please, give them 68 new simple churches this year.
There are 343,700 people living in the state of Nigde. Only about 129 might be believers.
Lord, please remember the Jew, Spanish people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Spirit, help the 129 believers find a person of peace today among the 343,571 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Nigde, Turkey.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.prayer: Father, convict the 129 believers in Nigde to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.

location.name: Nigde
location.people_groups_list: Arab, Syrian, Herki, Arab, Iraqi, Gajal, Gadzhal, Arab, North Iraqi
